sub_concepts.name: Reaction rate
sub_concepts.definition: The speed at which reactants are converted into products in a chemical reaction.

sub_concepts.name: Rate laws
sub_concepts.definition: Mathematical expressions that relate the rate of a reaction to the concentration of reactants.

sub_concepts.name: Rate-determining step
sub_concepts.definition: The slowest step in a reaction mechanism that determines the overall rate of the reaction.

sub_concepts.name: Catalysis
sub_concepts.definition: The process of increasing the rate of a chemical reaction by adding a substance known as a catalyst.
